title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.3 - Notification to applicant of nonapproval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.3 - Notification to applicant of nonapproval

State Regulations

Upon refusal to recommend approval of an application for
authority to practice or for rerating, the Podiatry Practice Committee shall
notify the applicant, in writing, of such refusal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
340.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
